settings.content: Always Free Shipping

settings.title: Tell Your Friends
settings.content: UsedCardboardBoxes.com provides high-quality, cheap, used moving kits, moving boxes and moving accessories. All are shipped throughout the USA for FREE, Moving Kits arrive within 1-2 business days if ordered weekdays by 3pm.

settings.subheading: Starting at $39.95 and always free 1-2 day shipping. Order weekdays by 3pm and ships same day!
settings.title: EARTH-FRIENDLY MOVING KITS

settings.subheading: Most are used once then crushed (recycled). There is a better way.
settings.title: 100 BILLION BOXES MANUFACTURED IN U.S. EACH YEAR

settings.subheading: UCB rescues MILLIONS of boxes from those crushers annually. Each goes through a rigorous quality inspection backed by our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
settings.title: REUSE > RECYCLE

settings.subheading: Always free shipping on all items. Expedited 1-2 Day Delivery on all USED Moving Kits. Order weekdays by 3pm, ships same day!
settings.title: FAST, FREE SHIPPING

settings.subheading: See how UCB went from a dinner napkin idea to sourcing high quality used boxes for cheaper than new, shipped right to your door in days.
settings.title: SUSTAINABILITY IN ACTION
Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.title: ALWAYS FREE SHIPPING
settings.content: Order any Moving Kit by 3pm on weekdays, ships same day and delivers in 1-2 days!

settings.quote: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and condition of the boxes. I would highly recommend this company to anyone. - Jeff (Kearney, MO)

The boxes were like new quality and the price for the box package that I purchased was more than $100 cheaper than similar packages I had found elsewhere. Delivery was fast and free and your customer service was very responsive. - Mackenzie (Wilmington, DE)

This is the second time we’ve ordered through your company and you haven’t failed us. We love the quick turnaround, quality product (clean boxes), and price point. Thanks for all you do! - Shawn (Parker, CO)
2nd time using these boxes. They are perfect, delivered in a timely fashion and price is great. - Debbie (Murrells Inlet, SC)

The boxes arrived on time. You would think that used cardboard boxes would be all beat up and ragged. Yes, they were used, but they were all in good shape. Totally satisfied with the product. - Keith (Rosharon, TX)
Repeat customer. Both smooth experiences, supplying us with the materials necessary to proficiently move at affordable rates. - Robert (Greenwood, IN)
